name: Holiday Special - Farm Box gift sets!
description: ***Christmas Order Deadline: Tuesday, December 17th at 10pm! If your order is received after this deadline, we cannot guarantee it will arrive before Christmas. Furthermore, if your order is received after Wednesday, December 18th, it likely won't be shipped out until the week of January 6th, when our shop reopens. Thanks for your support!!! (If desperate, please email us for a list of stores in your area that carry our products)*** Our best selling farm boxes are tied up with a bow to make a perfect little gift set. You can choose between three options: 2 box set including our Sea Salt and Vanilla & Chai (red & green) 2 box set including Cocoa Latte and Maple Cream (white & blue) OR. THE BEST YET. & the fastest way to someones heart. All four boxes: one Sea Salt & Vanilla, one Chai, one Maple Cream, one Cocoa Latte pure awesome. the goats will also do a an extra leap and hop on their way down the mountain knowing you love their goat milk caramels so. :)

name: Gertrude's Vintage Cigar Box Special
description: ***Christmas Order Deadline: Tuesday, December 17th at 10pm! If your order is received after this deadline, we cannot guarantee it will arrive before Christmas. Furthermore, if your order is received after Wednesday, December 18th, it likely won't be shipped out until the week of January 6th, when our shop reopens. Thanks for your support!!! (If desperate, please email us for a list of stores in your area that carry our products)*** We have a goat named Gertrude Stein. She was our third goat. She is very special. We fancy that she, if given the choice, would probably smoke a fat cigar and write poems all day instead of being a goat. Instead, she's a goat. And she hangs out all day with her daughter and grand-daughter eating and getting her head scratched. Which is pretty swell, too. So we're naming this gift after her. We chanced upon these New England antique cigar boxes (Top Stone Bouquet out of Connecticut) at a great vintage shop in Bellows Falls. What we're going to do is fill them with caramels and goatfit them for the holidays. We've only got 4 of them, alas, so nab 'em while you can. If ever there was a limited edition Gertrude Stein the goat gift...this is it. Includes 9 of each of the four flavors (sea salt & vanilla, chai, maple, cocoa latte) for a total of 36 caramels + a gift card.

name: Cello Bag
description: ***Christmas Order Deadline: Tuesday, December 17th at 10pm! If your order is received after this deadline, we cannot guarantee it will arrive before Christmas. Furthermore, if your order is received after Wednesday, December 18th, it likely won't be shipped out until the week of January 6th, when our shop reopens. Thanks for your support!!! (If desperate, please email us for a list of stores in your area that carry our products)*** Our award-winning farmstead goat milk caramels. We use--as our primary ingredient and principal flavoring agent--fresh, raw, creamy goat's milk supplied by our herd of healthy, happy, free-browsing companions. Handmade at the farm with the help of Manhattan, Orion, Fern, Gertrude, Cicada, Cy, Solaris, Junebug, Ahmic, Meridien, Winnimere, and Luna using only fresh & delicious milk combined with the highest quality ingredients. See all of our goats here. Four flavors: 1) Our original sea salt & bourbon vanilla -- this caramel was selected as the 2012 outstanding confection and awarded the gold SOFI at last summer's Fancy Food Show. 2) Our goat milk chai caramel -- which is currently a finalist for a prestigious Good Food Award! Made with organic chai supplied by our friend Neil Harley of Vermont's own Chai Wallah. 3) NEW: Maple Cream Goat Milk Caramel featuring maple syrup from our neighbor at Plummer's Sugarhouse in Grafton, VT. 4) NEW: Cocoa Latte Goat Milk Caramel featuring local favorite Mocha Joe's Espresso & Askinosie White Chocolate made with Goat's Milk. Net Wt 2.2 oz (60 grams), or approx. 7 pieces. Free Shipping on all Orders over $75! Please allow 1 week from time of order for processing/delivery. *We do not ship internationally at this time

name: Handmade Vermont Box

(If desperate, please email us for a list of stores in your area that carry our products)*** There's nothing subtle about romance in the goat kingdom. All who raise or have spent time with these creatures knows this. Well, so too with this gift, which will explicitly and heavy-handedly express your deepest love, adoration, desire etc to he/she/it of your choosing. Even if that person is yourself. Includes caramels -- all housed in a beautiful wooden box custom made for Big Picture Farm by the good folks at the Vermont Wooden Box Company. Go ahead, express yourself. Includes one gift card. Our award-winning farmstead goat milk caramels. We use--as our primary ingredient and principal flavoring agent--fresh, raw, creamy goat's milk supplied by our herd of healthy, happy, free-browsing companions. Handmade at the farm with the help of Manhattan, Orion, Fern, Gertrude, Cicada, Cy, Solaris, Junebug, Ahmic, Meridien, Winnimere, and Luna using only fresh & delicious milk combined with the highest quality ingredients. See all of our goats here. Four flavors: 1) Our original sea salt & bourbon vanilla -- this caramel was selected as the 2012 outstanding confection and awarded the gold SOFI at last summer's Fancy Food Show. 2) Our goat milk chai caramel -- which is currently a finalist for a prestigious Good Food Award! Made with organic chai supplied by our friend Neil Harley of Vermont's own Chai Wallah. 3) NEW: Maple Cream Goat Milk Caramel featuring maple syrup from our neighbor at Plummer's Sugarhouse in Grafton, VT. 4) NEW: Cocoa Latte Goat Milk Caramel featuring local favorite Mocha Joe's Espresso & Askinosie White Chocolate made with Goat's Milk. name: Big Picture Farm Sonnet
description: ***Christmas Order Deadline: Tuesday, December 17th at 10pm! If your order is received after this deadline, we cannot guarantee it will arrive before Christmas. Furthermore, if your order is received after Wednesday, December 18th, it likely won't be shipped out until the week of January 6th, when our shop reopens. Thanks for your support!!! (If desperate, please email us for a list of stores in your area that carry our products)*** After four years of making cheese we finally have our very own cheese for sale! A raw milk, cellar aged, farmstead goat tomme made with the milk from our 23 does. We only make this cheese in the summer months, so have limited supply. At this time we are selling it by the wheel - so 5lbs of yum. Yes. An entire wheel of cheese. Perfect for your holiday gathering. Also perfect for all your gourmet cooking needs. Think cheese crisps. Pasta carbonara. Pretty much I use this cheese in any recipe that calls for cheese. It is versatile.

options.name: one entire delicious wheel of cheese

name: VERMONT IS SWEET - Limited Edition Collaboration
description: ***Christmas Order Deadline: Tuesday, December 17th at 10pm! If your order is received after this deadline, we cannot guarantee it will arrive before Christmas. Furthermore, if your order is received after Wednesday, December 18th, it likely won't be shipped out until the week of January 6th, when our shop reopens. Thanks for your support!!! (If desperate, please email us for a list of stores in your area that carry our products)*** Fat Toad Farm has long been a goat dairy that has inspired us. A fellow farmstead goat milk caramel producing operation, they boil the milk down from their own herd of goats to make an outrageously delicious goat milk caramel sauce. We thought a collaboration was a natural fit. Included in this awesome gift ensemble is one 8 oz jar of Fat Toad Farm's velvety goat milk caramel sauce along with a 12 piece farm box of our deliciously rich goat milk caramel candies. With this ensemble you are truly getting to taste the sweet treats that Vermont has to offer - so we made up this special limited edition tote bag 'Vermont is Sweet' to go along with it. All your friends will be wanting one too! Free Shipping on all Orders over $75!
